divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS ON THE FRONT PORCH ME AND MY COUSIN I TURNED MY HEAD I SAW A BRIGHT LIGHT FLASHING I ASK MY COUSIN DO HE SEE IT HE SAID IT WAS A AIRPLANE I SAID JUST KEEP LOOKING AT IT HE SAID ITS CHANGING COLORS I THEN SAID YOU SEE WHAT I SEE I DIDN'T WANT HIM TO THINK I WAS CRAZY I GOT UP WALKED AWAY FROM AND CALLED 911 AND ASKED IF THEY COULD SEEN SOMEONE OUT I THEN TOLD MY COUSIN I CALLED 911 SO WE KEPT WATCHING THE OBJECT IT STARTED GOING UP AND DOWN THE OFFICERS ARRIVED WE SHOWED THEM THE OBJECT IT WAS THREE OFFICERS THEY TOOK OUT THERE BINOCULARS AND THEY WERE LIKE WE SEE A OBJECT WITH DIFFERENT LIGHTS FLASHING THEY THEN GOT IN TOUCH WITH THE LOCAL AIR FIELD THERE RADAR HAD SHOWN THAT NOTHING WAS OUT THERE THEN ONE OF OFFICERS SPOTTED ANOTHER OBJECT THEN ANOTHER SPOTTED THREE OBJECTS LIKE NEAR EACH OTHER THERE WERE SEVERAL IN THE SKY I DID NOT COUNT THEM WITNESSES WERE MY MOTHER MY AUNT MY BROTHER AND GRANDMOTHER
